Posts.Content: Deannie wrote:  I am 51 years old and have discovred a good sized lump in my right breast.Two years ago i had to have four tumours removed from my left Breast all were solid but thankfully were benighn My Mother had breast cancer in her fortities and had to have a mastectomy due to the advance stage of the cancer.My Doctor has told me this puts me at high risk for cancer. This lump feels different from the others before in my Left Breast .I am cocerned and worried.I just got engaged and am frightned of having to tell my finace .He is 41 and has not gone through this with anyone before. Should i be worried? Deannie  Deannie Dx Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lump found in right breast Deannie mawhinney
